name: Tour Guide Sniper - Arcade Edition
description:
For The People! The Greatest Toilet Game Since Minesweeper is here! New Tourists have arrived. That means new Targets are trying to escape! Will you be able to find them ;)
  • Selecting / Firing - Right Mouse Button / One Finger Touch
  • Use your Tool - Left Mouse Button / Two Finger Touch
  • Pause the Game - ESC key / Three Fingers ;)
This is what's available in the demo
  • 3 Playable Levels
  • Over 1.000 unique Tourists
  • Arcade Mode which contains two game types
  • Classic Game Mode - Each play though gets increasingly harder with a counter for your kills
  • Time Attack Game Mode - Like Classic Mode but harder
  • Fun and Heart-Pumping Music
